definition: هيهات haihātu, haihāt, haihāti but oh! far from the mark! wrong! what an idea! how preposterous! │ هيهات ان it is absolutely out of the question that ...; هيهات ان يفعل كذا how far he is from doing so! هيهات بين هذا وذاك what a difference between them! how different they are! وهيهات لك ذلك and how impossible is this to you!
